title: When my internet cuts out in my promos, it counts as a loss
body: I jumped into champ select in my Silver 5 promos. My internet cuts out and my client crashes. Of course, it counts as a loss. I guess i deserve it, being stuck in bronze. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
It definitely sucks to be punished for something you can't help, but ultimately you've still left the game, and it has the same effect on your team as an afk does. If you were to give out a free pass every now and again, what's to stop someone from just unplugging their ethernet cable to no penalty because they don't like someone on their team?

All that said (and I'm sorry if it sounds harsh, but the few asshats that would abuse it are the ones that ruin it for everyone), if it's only once, you'll get back there no problem. So long as you're improving your gameplay, you'll keep climbing!
